}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== Two differing SKUs are noted in the FCC test report.. *'''NFA344''': 2T2R, MIMO <small>(QCNFA344AC?)</small> -> '''QCA6174''' (NFA344) :[[Qualcomm Atheros QCNFA344A]] (QCA6174A) ::FCC ID: [https://fcc.io/PPD/-QCNFA344A PPD-QCNFA344A] :[[Qualcomm Atheros QCNFA354]] (QCA6174-5) ::[http://certifications.prod.wi-fi.org/pdf/certificate/public/download?cid=WFA55249 WFA55249] *'''NFA345''': 1T2R, MISO -> '''QCA6164''' (NFA345) ::FCC ID: [https://fcc.io/PPD/-QCNFA345 PPD-QCNFA345] ? :Product: QCA6164-5, Wi-Fi Component: NFA345 :ID: [http://certifications.prod.wi-fi.org/pdf/certificate/public/download?cid=WFA55153 WFA55153] Wi-Fi Certified
The FCC MAR letter notes the used ICs as '''QCA6174''' + '''QCA6164'''
==Links of Interest== *[http://listing.driveragent.com/c/pci/168c/003e 168c:003e on '''driveragent.com'''] (QCA61x4/QCA6174) :linux driver - [https://wireless.wiki.kernel.org/en/users/drivers/ath10k ath10k]
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery> File:Killer1525.png| </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]

(1x1 802.11ac WiFi/BT4.1 M.2 Type Card) :QCA6164 (168c:0041) [http://cateee.net/lkddb/web-lkddb/ATH10K.html ath10k] [[Qualcomm Atheros|QCA]] *[[Qualcomm Atheros QCNFA354|'''NFA354''']] FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/PPD-QCNFA354 PPD-QCNFA354] ([http://certifications.prod.wi-fi.org/pdf/certificate/public/download?cid=WFA55249 WFA55249]) :802.11ac WiFi/BT4.1 M.2 2226 Type Card - QCA6174-5 [[Qualcomm Atheros|QCA]]
